title: How seeds are scattered

description: Episode of Series "E.F.V.A. Primary Botany". Designed for primary schools, shows how plants produce flowers and then fruits which contain seeds. Different kinds of fruits and seeds - runner beans, laburnum tree, willow seeds, thistles, sycamore tree, are used to illustrate methods of dispersal by wind, water and animals.
